sub_topic: Identifying the type of inorganic compound (ionic, covalent, metallic)
message_1: Identify the type of inorganic compound formed between sodium and chlorine.
message_2: The inorganic compound formed between sodium and chlorine is sodium chloride (NaCl). It is an ionic compound, as it is formed through the transfer of electrons between a metal (sodium) and a non-metal (chlorine).
